extendedInfo.description: Get lucky and strike it rich in all your favorite Casino games! Have an adventure like no other in our original Slot Machines! Forbidden Island â everybody wins free chips when the Volcano erupts! Fortune awaits those brave enough to enter the Enchanted Cavernâ¦ TOP FEATURES: â¢ TONS of Slots, with mini-games you won't find anywhere else! â¢ NEW Social Scatterâ¢ Slots Games â everybody wins together! â¢ Daily Reward Games â win up to 300K FREE CHIPS in the Reward Center! â¢ Play LIVE with your friends! Beat the house in Blackjack or test your skills in Poker! â¢ Customize and strut your stuff with free pets, gifts, and power ups! ---- Discover more from Big Fish Games! ---- Find us at www.bigfishgames.com or follow us @BigFishGames to get the latest on new games and special deals! â¨

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: The game has been frozen since sat, keeps showing plinko  then freezes and the back button won\'t work either
reviews.author: Donna Correa

reviews.comment: Should give more money in the chip bonus and definitely add free games... 3 card poker would be nice as well
reviews.author: Jonathan Carrillo

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: 4 different times I have paid the 4000 to get on the sit and go table and it has taken my coins and not let me in 16000 coins ripped off that sucks do not play those tables.
reviews.author: Deric Neil

reviews.title: Need Help
reviews.comment: I purchased a chip package and it gave me an error message that said to try later. I tried to purchase again and same problem. It charged my credit card twice and I didn\'t get any chips. Please help. I don\'t know who to contact to get it refunded. This is not good.
reviews.author: T. Whatley

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Game is froze on free game. Can not back out or anything. I have uninstalled and reinstalled still hung up..
reviews.author: David Vann

reviews.comment: Can\'t get the lucky \"free\" spin to work. Keeps popping up when I open the app and can\'t even play!
reviews.author: Kimberly Ascanio

reviews.title: Good job!
reviews.comment: I love the new update! The slot games do not lag anymore,same thing witb blackjack. This is my favorite casino app now!
reviews.author: Ainz Vinarao

reviews.title: Loved it....till sat.
reviews.comment: Please fix I want to play!! Its the best game I have found on my phone and I never had any problems till the last update. Now its frozen on the plinko free game!!! Please fix!!! Today!!
reviews.author: Rebecca Reynolds

reviews.title: EPIC F**king game
reviews.comment: I love t its my favorite . of all casino games most.ingenious most interesting and most interactive
reviews.author: Amanda Boccassini

reviews.comment: I love this game love the fact that Ur giving more free chips other than the bonus every 4 hrs, u should change the bonus to every 2 hrs, & 1000 chips instead of 500,  & u should have the ticket bonuses instead of once every night at 1:00 am it should be 2 times in a 24 hr period like once in the morning around 6:00, & then again at 10:00 in the night!!!! Gives u more play!!!
reviews.author: Ladonne Alvarado

reviews.comment: Would be 5 but it keeps telling me to play \"today\'s free game\" and freezes my phone.
reviews.author: Andee Apodaca

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: The game gets stuck, I cannot acces some of the festures. Its been 3 days now!  Pkease fix!
reviews.author: Elsabe Smal

reviews.title: No good update.
reviews.comment: I don\'t get my daily tickets anymore misses out on almost ten tickets already. When my tickets come back rating will go up.
reviews.author: Michael Ortiz

reviews.comment: Game is interesting and generous in giving bonus. But, always hang cannot continue thus may have to uninstall it.
reviews.author: Yepor Lilian

reviews.title: Updates/changes for the better.
reviews.comment: Way better with the bigger chip bonuses. Has slots with 9 and lines and betting for each line  and giving a 500 chip bonus per day is just being cheapskates. At least now I can play on the bonus I get every day. However, u are not getting the tickets eqch day so almost forces to spend money. Give one get one I guess.
reviews.author: Joan Schnell

reviews.title: Love the Games, Hate the Kinks
reviews.comment: I love the games and the networking with people, but hate the slow network, the amount of space it takes, and now it is stuck on a free plinko game that I can\'t back out of to play. Grrr, give me my game back.
reviews.author: Letisha Wilson

reviews.title: bring back self aware blackjack
reviews.comment: extra leggy on the main screen..NOTE TO SELF AWARE: bring back the blackjack only version thanks
reviews.author: Jeffrey Boado

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Zte andriod Plz help fix my problem. I tried doing everything to Unfreeze it but it\'s still frozen on the rewards center. Even when rebooting phone.
reviews.author: Hella Kute

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: However has a problem with freezing. Has since I have downloaded it over a year ago and not much has changed, but more frequent freezing
reviews.author: Eric Luchinski

reviews.title: Laggy, glitchy, tight slots
reviews.comment: Game started laggy and slow, with occasional force close. Recent update bricked it- opens to black screen, force closes. Totally unplayable now. Plus, when it did work, the slots never paid out! Whether I had a thousand credits or fifty thousand, I\'m always out after twenty mins. Always.
reviews.author: Haden Farley
